title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: llama-index-integrations-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding connectors for Ollama; ingest docs and query local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama API; markdown, code highlighting, model manager.

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui; open-source local AI interface with plugin ecosystem, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal, written in Python.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot-like suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub for running Ollama server.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull models, and stream responses.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Emacs package to chat with Ollama models inside Emacs buffers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes showing how to integrate Ollama with Flask, Next.js, LangChain, RAG, function-calling, etc.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping the Ollama JavaScript SDK for dependency-injected LLM services.

title: ollama-rag-api
summary: FastAPI template that spins up a RAG service using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB with upload/chat endpoints.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama model responses into Discord threads with slash commands.
